articles.author: Al Jazeera
articles.title: Asia bears biggest climate-change brunt amid extreme weather: WMO - Al Jazeera English
articles.description: UN agency says floods, storms leading cause of casualties and economic losses as impact of heatwaves intensifies.
articles.content:
Asia was the region most affected by climate change, weather and water-related hazards globally last year, the United Nations weather agency has said.
In a report published on Tuesday, the World Met… [+3502 chars]
